definition.name: idv.dit.data.users
definition.description: xlfid(NOVLCOMSET.idmresource.NOVLCOMSETPrompts.gcv.dscr.idv.dit.data.users)This GCV is used to get a reference to the container where users are stored. This value is used for all drivers. If you want separate containers for each driver, use the GCV on the Driver Object. The DN is expected in slash-format.

definition.name: idv.dit.data.groups
definition.description: xlfid(NOVLCOMSET.idmresource.NOVLCOMSETPrompts.gcv.dscr.idv.dit.data.groups)This GCV is used to get a reference to the container where groups are stored. This value is used for all drivers. If you want separate containers for each driver, use the GCV on the Driver Object. The DN is expected in slash-format.
